! This is an unusual pin of the knight on f6. If knight moves then bishop on g7 is lost. If Black castles then the knight on f6 is lost. If Black plays 12...Nh5 13. dxc6 Bxd4 14. cxd7+ Bxd7 Nxd4 loses a piece.
